staked.label: Amount staked in CC
staked.tooltip: Consensus Connections (CC) are secure financial agreements where you lock funds with others to earn rewards.

descriptionSection.text: Autonomous Trust Momentum (ATM) lets you earn rewards by securely locking funds in financial agreements called Consensus Connections. Using the advanced ATM-Rank (PR) algorithm, your contributions are evaluated to calculate fair rewards in LUCA, ATM's native token.
descriptionSection.highlight: The more connections you create, the greater your earning potential, unlocking higher rewards and opportunities. These tools aim to build a healthier, more stable, and prosperous DeFi ecosystem.

digitalSelf.title: Create your digital-self
digitalSelf.description: Create and customise your AVATAR for various purposes. These avatars can be used as profile pictures, in shared links, or for interactive communication.

prValue.title: Higher PR value, greater rewards
prValue.description: ATM-Rank measures user influence based on connections and stakes. Higher PR values earn greater LUCA rewards and increased community influence.

connectFriend.title: Connect with a friend
connectFriend.description: Create secure token agreements, earn LUCA rewards, and contribute to a stable and trusted ecosystem.

aiSupport.title: AI-Powered Support
aiSupport.description: A-Team provides 24/7 financial advice, offering honest, data-driven insights from market analysis, risk, and research.

messaging.title: Decentralised messaging
messaging.description: Join discussions, share insights, and connect with the ATM community through chatrooms or direct messages.

socialPlatform.title: Engage in social platform
socialPlatform.description: Share news, join discussions, and connect with the ATM community in a seamless, interactive space.

communitySection.title: COMMUNITY
communitySection.subtitle: Unleash your influence
communitySection.descriptionHighlight1: become a part of our vibrant community
communitySection.descriptionEnd: , and lead the way to a groundbreaking tomorrow.
communitySection.additionalText: Step into a world where your influence matters. Be a Key Opinion Leader (KOL) who shapes the future of ATM Innovation

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description1: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the future of gaming, where innovation knows no bounds.
gaming.description2: The gaming future transcends entertainment, blending technology, creativity, and community to craft an immersive digital landscape.

ecology.title: Ecology
ecology.description1: Discover sustainable solutions that harmonize technology with environmental responsibility.
ecology.description2: Our ecological initiatives focus on creating a greener future through innovative blockchain technology and sustainable practices.

travel.title: Traveling
travel.description1: Elevate your travel experience with LUCA. Through strategic partnerships with travel agencies, LUCA opens doors to a world of possibilities.
travel.description2: Now, users can seamlessly use LUCA to explore the globe, unlocking a new era of convenience and flexibility in travel.

form.title: Got any question? Simply fill-in the contact form. We would like to hear from you!
form.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

subscription.description: Subscribe ATM to receive the latest events and community updates
